channel.title: How to check if laptop will work with kicksecure
channel.description: I want to buy laptop, but also want kicksecure to work on it as host os. Is there any way to check if its compatibile? It will have enough ram (32), Intel processor and gpu intel integrated or nvidia dedicated.
